segments.text: No-no-no , sorry ! That's a handicapped parking space . Are you handicapped ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but this is an emergency ! Please !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , but you'll have to park in a normal space .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , OK , fine ! Just open the gate !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be patient , miss . It'll just be a second .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank god ! A car's leaving . It's my turn !
segments.speaker: S2
